entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 11 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon then snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
